Layer.name: maxspeed
Layer.Datasource:
(SELECT way, highway, CAST(tags->'maxspeed' AS INTEGER) AS maxspeed FROM planet_osm_line WHERE highway IN ('motorway', 'motorway_link', 'trunk', 'trunk_link', 'primary', 'primary_link', 'secondary', 'secondary_link', 'tertiary', 'tertiary_link', 'residential', 'unclassified', 'living_street') AND ( tags->'maxspeed' ~ E'^\\d+$') UNION SELECT way, highway, CASE WHEN tags->'maxspeed:type' = 'DE:zone20' THEN 20 WHEN tags->'maxspeed:type' = 'DE:zone30' THEN 30 WHEN tags->'maxspeed:type' = 'DE:urban' THEN 50 WHEN tags->'maxspeed:type' = 'DE:rural' THEN 100 WHEN tags->'maxspeed:type' = 'DE:motorway' THEN 200 END as maxspeed FROM planet_osm_line WHERE highway IN ('motorway', 'motorway_link', 'trunk', 'trunk_link', 'primary', 'primary_link', 'secondary', 'secondary_link', 'tertiary', 'tertiary_link', 'residential', 'unclassified', 'living_street') AND ( tags->'maxspeed' IS NULL AND tags->'maxspeed:type' IN ('DE:zone20', 'DE:zone30', 'DE:urban', 'DE:rural', 'DE:motorway')) UNION SELECT way, highway, 5 as maxspeed FROM planet_osm_line WHERE highway = 'living_street' AND tags->'maxspeed' IS NULL AND tags->'maxspeed:type' IS NULL ) AS way
way &datasource-settings;
